trials.title: Kweps
main_text: Kweps hunt in packs. Even though they are pack animals, all of them have highly idiosyncractic food
preferences and behaviors. Some of them like to eat apples and others like to eat oranges. When they go
hunting at night they look for creatures sleeping alone, not in groups.

continuation.nme: and jump up and down in circles

trials.title: Ludinos
main_text: The Ludinos are an alien tribe. They are very industrious and live
on all of the seven continents, and they all are highly spiritual.

trials.title: Lorches
main_text: Lorches have massive beaks and are found on the continents of Dodi and Gomi. The two continents
are quite different in what kinds of animals are available for them to eat.

trials.title: Finding food
main_text: Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Like most
creatures on Dax, Krens eat other creatures to survive. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures with
large antlers, are a resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Benli, far from the oceans.

continuation.filler: and incorporate stups into their religion
continuation.nme: and sing songs to the stups to help them relax

property1.supportFirst: Stup-herders care for the stups and make money from selling their meat.
property1.supportSecond: Stup-herders care for the stups and make money from selling their meat.

trials.title: Kaples
main_text: Kaples are small animals that live in the jungles. They are most active
at dawn and at dusk, when their usual predators are less active. Their thick fur helps camouflage
them among the plants on the forest floor.

trials.title: Isooms
main_text: Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions of Fale. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often
cultivate isooms for food.

continuation.filler: and prefer to grow in the shade

nme_property.singular: produces fruit with a sour taste
nme_property.plural: produce fruit with a sour taste

trials.title: Mooks
main_text: Mooks are ferocious creatures that live on the continent of Benli. Benli has dramatic elevation changes
unlike any other continent on Dax. Animals find terrority in locations that will maximize their chances
of survival.

continuation.critical: and at the bottom of deep canyons
continuation.filler: and one would be wise to keep their distance from them
continuation.nme: and watch over the low-lying regions during the day

trials.title: Ollers
main_text: Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use tools on land but have a difficult
time making them. So the tools are passed down from parents to children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. Baby
ollers find it very exciting to be on land, but they have trouble walking and need to be carried by members of their families.

property1.supportFirst: Guklags are slings made out of strong seaweed, which are worn across the back.
property1.supportSecond: Guklags are also made out of seaweed, and are worn across the back as slings.

property2.supportFirst: Trullets are baskets made from woven seaweed, which are worn across chest.
property2.supportSecond: Trullets are also made out of seaweed. They are baskets that can be worn across the chest.

trials.title: Fengnors
main_text: Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures. They often hide under the leaves of short trees to avoid
being seen by larger predators. They scrape the bark off trees to eat. They have highly complex
mating habits. They mate for life, and the males often bring twigs and leaves to the females during
courtship.

continuation.nme: and store tree-bark in them for safe keeping

property1.supportFirst: Gluers are tree-like plants with purple, needle-like leaves.
property1.supportSecond: Gluers are tree-like plants with purple, needle-like leaves.

property2.supportFirst: Droops are tree-like plants with broad, orange leaves.
property2.supportSecond: Droops are tree-like plants with broad, orange leaves.

trials.title: Vimbles
main_text: Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. Vimbles live for a year
or less. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to hibernate over the winter before
starting a new colony.

continuation.critical: and in the abandoned burrows of other animals
continuation.filler: and only emerge when the weather has become warmer
continuation.nme: and give birth twice a year

trials.title: Crafts
main_text: The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. Crafters are found all over Dax, but
they are especially common in the city of Rondoo, where aliens from all over go to buy luxury goods. To
help make themselves known, crafters join guilds with other crafters of the same trade.

continuation.filler: and pledge allegiance to Tinnius the Elder
continuation.nme: and sell their baskets in the Warfi marketplace

property1.supportFirst: One of the guilds in Rondoo is the Tinno guild.
property1.supportSecond: Another guild in Rondoo is called the Tinno guild.

property2.supportFirst: One of the guilds in Rondoo is the Farza guild.
property2.supportSecond: Another guild in Rondoo is called the Farza guild.

trials.title: Agriculture
main_text: The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops. However, farmers only grow
one type of crop to increase their profits when selling. Their farms are very big, often stretching
several miles in every direction.

continuation.critical: and burn their fields to plant soroneeks
continuation.filler: and in the summer watch their fields carefully
continuation.nme: and spray them with a naturally-occurring fertilizer

property1.plural: flood their fields to plant fujusi

property1.supportSecond: Fujusi are a plants, similar to rice, that require a lot of water to grow.

trials.title: Reesles
main_text: Reesles are strange, furry creatures, often found in the homes of the aliens. They are not house pets
but quasi-domesticated animals. They will steal food from you if you are not paying attention. They have
special headgear to help other aliens identify their owners.

continuation.filler: and roam around by themselves at night

property1.singular: wears a wutsat around its head
property1.supportFirst: Wutsats are a kind of brightly-colored headband made from reeds.
property1.supportSecond: Wutsats are a kind of brightly-colored headband made from reeds.

property2.singular: wears a krevnor around its head
property2.supportFirst: Krevnors are multicolored scarves made from rough cloth.
property2.supportSecond: Krevnors are multicolored scarves made from rough cloth.

data_trials.page_content: Kweps hunt in packs. Even though they are pack animals, all of them have highly idiosyncractic food
preferences and behaviors. Some of them like to eat apples and others like to eat oranges. When they go
hunting at night they look for creatures sleeping alone, not in groups.
The Ludinos are an alien tribe. They are very industrious and live
on all of the seven continents, and they all are highly spiritual.
Glippets are large creatures, quite intelligent, with a life-span of about
sixty years.
Lorches have massive beaks and are found on the continents of Dodi and Gomi. The two continents
are quite different in what kinds of animals are available for them to eat.
Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Like most
creatures on Dax, Krens eat other creatures to survive. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures with
large antlers, are a resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Benli, far from the oceans.
Kaples are small animals that live in the jungles. They are most active
at dawn and at dusk, when their usual predators are less active. Their thick fur helps camouflage
them among the plants on the forest floor.
Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions of Fale. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often
cultivate isooms for food.
Mooks are ferocious creatures that live on the continent of Benli. Benli has dramatic elevation changes
unlike any other continent on Dax. Animals find terrority in locations that will maximize their chances
of survival.
Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use tools on land but have a difficult
time making them. So the tools are passed down from parents to children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. Baby
ollers find it very exciting to be on land, but they have trouble walking and need to be carried by members of their families.
Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures. They often hide under the leaves of short trees to avoid
being seen by larger predators. They scrape the bark off trees to eat. They have highly complex
mating habits. They mate for life, and the males often bring twigs and leaves to the females during
courtship.
Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. Vimbles live for a year
or less. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to hibernate over the winter before
starting a new colony.
The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. Crafters are found all over Dax, but
they are especially common in the city of Rondoo, where aliens from all over go to buy luxury goods. To
help make themselves known, crafters join guilds with other crafters of the same trade.
The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops. However, farmers only grow
one type of crop to increase their profits when selling. Their farms are very big, often stretching
several miles in every direction.
Reesles are strange, furry creatures, often found in the homes of the aliens. They are not house pets
but quasi-domesticated animals. They will steal food from you if you are not paying attention. They have
special headgear to help other aliens identify their owners.

catch_trials.property: What percentage of birds do you think are male?
What percentage of lions do you think lay eggs?
Suppose there is a dog that is a pet. What are the chances that it has a collar?
Suppose there is an elephant that lives in Africa. What are the chances that it lives in Asia?
cranoor is the king of all beings
mooks live on the continent of Benli
taifles have gold spots that are sticky
ollers spend most of their lives in water
glippets have a life-span of about 60 years
lorches have long legs and breathe underwater
I went through a book about the planet Dax. It has seven continents like Earth. There are many organisms that reside on the planet and this book described the organisms and their various activities.
